resources.string: Held prior to the beginning of fall and spring semesters, Destination Iowa State is a program designed to ease the transition to college for new Iowa State students.
Scheman Building. Pick up your Iowa State gear before heading to The Center of ExCYtment!
Scheman Courtyard. Your adventure will begin here where you will meet your team and enjoy a picnic dinner.
Hilton Coliseum. Destination Iowa State Kickoff is your official welcome to the Cyclone family!
Central Campus. Teams meet for a pancake breakfast and discuss the day\'s schedule of events.
Houses gather to meet with their Community Advisor.
Teams will complete a scavenger hunt all over the Iowa State campus.
Memorial Union. Experience all the Memorial Union has to offer, inculding free food, activities, a hypnotist, and more!
Complete a service project in your new community.
Hilton Coliseum. SEE the show or BE the show. Michael\'s award winning show will blow your mind, temporarily of course.
